resources.string: "Couldn't fetch data. You appear to be disconnected from the internet."
"Couldn't read data from server. Please try again in a few moments."
"Couldn't find coordinates for selected parking lot. "
"Used to show location on map and for sorting parking lots by distance."
"No free parking space in sight? -> #ParkenDD http://parkendd.de"

"ParkenDD shows you a list of the number of available public parking spots in Dresden, Germany. It shows you whether a public parking lot is open or not, how many spots are available and where it is on a map.
The information displayed is up-to-date according to what is published officially on dresden.de/freie-parkplaetze.
The source for this application is available on Github. See https://github.com/kiliankoe/parkendd"
"dresden, parking, car, driving, navigation, park, public, parkinglot, lot"
"ParkenDD is unable to get location data. Please allow it to do so in the system settings."
"List will be updated on next refresh."
"The data might be outdated. It was last updated more than an hour ago."
"Unfortunately there don't seem to be any coordinates associated with this parking lot."

"Use this function to view into the future. Pick a date and see how many spaces will presumably be available at that point in time.
The graph shows the selected day and is zoom-/scrollable."

"The newly displayed cities are in an experimental state! Their data will probably be littered with errors and be incomplete.
If you're willing to join us in our effort of supporting new cities, please tap the feedback button below :)"
